channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Government shutdown would furlough about 750,000 federal workers, CBO says
item.description: Democrats insist that any stopgap funding bill included an extension of enhance Affordable Care Act tax credits due to expire at the end of 2025.

item.title: Trump says Harvard to pay $500 million in deal with administration

item.title: Nike’s results top expectations, but company warns recovery won't be 'linear'
As stocks soar, investors see little choice but to keep riding the bull market

item.description: Democrats have insisted that any short-term funding deal to avoid a shutdown of the U.S. government include an extension of enhanced Obamacare subsidi...

item.title: How Trump’s son-in-law Jared Kushner became part of the biggest buyout ever
Here's why the government shutdown fight hinges on Obamacare tax credits
item.description: Democrats demand Republicans agree to codify an extension of enhanced premium Obamacare tax credits to keep the government from shutting down.

item.title: Dow closes at new record as U.S. stocks gain despite looming government shutdown
S&P 500 and Nasdaq score best September in over 15 years. Can the momentum last?
Trump administration to expand coal leasing, fund coal plant upgrades
item.description: The U.S. will announce policies to encourage coal output, as the Trump administration seeks to reverse the decline of the fuel's use.
